alert.note: Alert for Houston (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 11:51PM CDT until April 13 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Allamakee County in northeastern Iowa... Northeastern Winneshiek County in northeastern Iowa... Southeastern Houston County in southeastern Minnesota... Southwestern Vernon County in southwestern Wisconsin... Northwestern Crawford County in southwestern Wisconsin... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1151 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mabel to 6 miles northeast of Decorah to near Ossian, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Waukon around 1215 AM CDT. Lansing and New Albin around 1220 AM CDT. Harpers Ferry around 1230 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Hanover, County Roads A 52 And X 52, County Roads A 52 And W 60, Waterville, State Road 76 And County X 16, Hesper and Nordness. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
